channel.title: Guys how do i mkae a cool serrver with the foloing detail plz reply!
channel.description:
i wanna make a server with
1. computers set up in certain places
2. i want the computers to be able to sell certain things like dragon stuff
3. i want to change what people drop
4. i want to lvl up like fats
plz tell me how!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Guys how do i mkae a cool serrver with the foloing detail plz reply!
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_II Diablo II
item.description:
@Diablo_II wrote:

Computers are called npcs and to make them go into autospwan.cfg and to edit what they say go to npchandler. To make a shop go to shops.cfg but I’m not sure how to add it to a npc.

To edit the drop go into Npchandler find somthing about npc drops (try searching a npc id) and you’ll see somthing like item3.kq item2.RandomKQ or if it’s one item there will just be a item id. copy and paste one, if it’s item3, etc just edit it in that file.

If you want ownage lvling up add a object that gives ownage xp.

Read full topic
item.source: Guys how do i mkae a cool serrver with the foloing detail plz reply!
